column1: @entity0 is a nine year old boy.  On one hot summer day, @entity0 is outside his house playing with his dog.  He is very hot and wants to have some ice cream.  He looks in his freezer and sees that he does not have ice cream.  @entity0 then hears the song of the ice cream truck.  @entity0 runs outside but does not see the ice cream truck.  He looks down the street but the ice cream truck is nowhere to be found.  The music of the truck starts to get softer and then louder.  @entity0 waits outside for an hour.  @entity0 then thinks that he needs money when the ice cream truck comes. He runs inside and finds five dollars in his room.  He then hears the ice cream truck song get very loud.  He runs back outside and sees the truck pass his house.  @entity0 runs after the truck and catches up with it. @entity0 buys Four ice cream pops and some candy.  He gives his five dollars to the ice cream man and gets one dollar back.  He walks home and happily eats all of his candy and ice cream.
@placeholder does @entity0 want to eat when he is playing outside
